column4: hi, im trying to get ubuntu on a tablet pc, a toshiba portege m200,  it doesnt have a cd drive, ive tried USB, SD card, netboot, nothing will work
i think i got the netboot settings wrong, does anyone know how to set up dhcpd.conf?
The man page is exhaustive on the subject.
The suggestion I gave you shows examples, has comments and describes in full detail how to do it, I don't know how to make it simpler.
